import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { collection, query, orderBy, limit, getDocs } from 'firebase/firestore'; import { db } from '../firebase/config'; function HomePage() { const [isHovered, setIsHovered] = useState(false); const [scrolled, setScrolled] = useState(false); const [topPromoters, setTopPromoters] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [error, setError] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { setScrolled(window.scrollY > 20); }; window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }, []); // Получаем данные промоутеров из Firebase useEffect(() => { const fetchPromoters = async () => { try { const promotersRef = collection(db, 'promoters'); const q = query( promotersRef, orderBy('flyers', 'desc'), limit(3) ); const querySnapshot = await getDocs(q); const promotersData = querySnapshot.docs.map(doc => ({ id: doc.id, ...doc.data() })); setTopPromoters(promotersData); setLoading(false); } catch (err) { console.error('Error fetching promoters:', err); setError('Не удалось загрузить данные промоутеров'); setLoading(false); } }; fetchPromoters(); }, []); // Компонент загрузки const LoadingCard = () => (
); // Компонент ошибки const ErrorMessage = () => (
{error}
); return (
